title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4622.20 - Persons prohibited as players
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4622.20 - Persons prohibited as players

State Regulations

No licensee shall permit any person who has participated
or assisted in the management or conduct of the games of chance license period
to participate as a player or purchase bell jar tickets at any time during such
license period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4622.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
